page.title: 07KETTLETOFT VILLAGE
page.content: I'm standing up from the slip_way, with my back to the sea, and on my right is{Belsair.}It's a house and also a{restaurant}and{P.O.}The first building round the corner is the home of the people who own the{Bakery}next door. Then comes the only{Hotel}on the Island. Next to the Hotel there is a {guest house,}then comes the{Bank of {Scotland}building. Next to the Bank is the Bank House where people can stay for holidays. Then comes the{Crab {Factory}where people put their crabs and lobsters to. Next comes a house, Scottish Brae, then another house, Girvan Cottage. Opposite Fintray there is a caravan, where the people who own the garage live. The{garage}is next door to the caravan. Then comes the old Fish'n'Chip shop which is not used any more. Finally comes Harbour House where the{Harbour Master}stays.
